<<div class="code"|<<span class="keyword"|module>> Eliom_comet: <<span class='code'|sig>><<a_api subproject="client" text=".." | module Eliom_comet >><<span class='code'|end>>>>~Handle unsolicited server to client communications~.\\

----
\\
when the page is not active the client stops making comet requests
    to the server~, implying that the client can~'t be notified by the
    server anymore~. ~The activity status is changed when the page is
    focused or unfocused~.\\


    ~To stop receiving inputs from a channel~, use ~Lwt~.cancel on a
    thread waiting for datas~. ~For instance~, if you iterate with
    <<span class='code'| let t ~= ~Lwt~_stream~.iter f ~%channel >> calling <<span class='code'|~Lwt~.cancel t>>
    will close the channel~.\\

<<div class="info"|<<span class='code'|~Channel~_full>> is raised when trying to read on a channel marked
    full by the server~. ~It is not possible to read anything else from a
    full channel~.\\
